author: jukka
msg: Looks like there's something different between my and rdonkin's environment, as a clean build produces slightly different set of newlines in the sitemap.

author: rpluem
msg: * Add apr_socket_is_connected to detect whether the remote side of a socket
is still open. The origin of apr_socket_is_connected is r473278 from
apr_socket_is_connected; adjusted to return an apr_status_t error
code, and pass an "at EOF" flag via an output parameter.

author: shuston
msg: Consistently show qpid-based paths in #include directives. Help this work from a CMake build. Fixes QPID-2151

author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-710. Added actions with constraints to the pipeline fault injection tests and changed SleepAction to support uniform random sleeping over an interval.

author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-710. Added actions with constraints to the pipeline fault injection tests and changed SleepAction to support uniform random sleeping over an interval.
